title: The Whedonverse
description:
Joss Whedon Comics - Whedonverse

NOTE - I have included a small txt file with a list of every comic in this torrent. It would be to your benefit to dl that first. I have attempted to find every comic there is in the Whedonverse either to completion or up to date! If I missed something PLEASE let me know. If you know where I can grab it...even better ;)
